response.original_title: Malbouffe, le côté obscur de l'industrie alimentaire
response.overview: This is a very worrying observation: 2.2 billion people, or 40% of the world's adult population, are overweight or obese. Junk food plays a major role in this public health crisis. Evidence is mounting against ultra-processed industrial foods, products that addict the most vulnerable consumers. The global food giants have known this for 20 years already.
response.title: Malbouffe, le côté obscur de l'industrie alimentaire
